SELECT /* prConrBase.getPrConrBase */ CB.CONR_NO , CB.CONR_NM , ( SELECT ARRAY_TO_STRING(ARRAY_AGG(TMPL_NM),'+') FROM PR_TMPL_CONR_MAPP_INFO S2 , PR_TMPL_BASE S3 WHERE CB.CONR_NO = S2.CONR_NO AND S2.TMPL_NO = S3.TMPL_NO ) AS TMPL_NM , ( SELECT ARRAY_TO_STRING(ARRAY_AGG(FN_GET_CODENAME('DP005',S3.CONR_TGT_CD)),'+') FROM PR_CONR_TGT_INFO S3 WHERE CB.CONR_NO = S3.CONR_NO ) AS CONR_TGT_NM , (CASE WHEN CB.SET_USE_YN='Y' THEN '사용' ELSE '사용안함' END) AS SET_USE_YN , CB.USE_YN , UB.USER_NM , CB.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(CB.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_CONR_BASE CB , ST_USER_BASE UB WHERE CB.AEMP_ID = UB.USER_ID AND COALESCE(AEMP_ID,'X') LIKE #{aempId} || '%' AND CB.USE_YN LIKE #{useYn} || '%' AND CB.CONR_NO LIKE #{conrNo} || '%' AND CB.CONR_NM LIKE #{conrNm} || '%'
AND EXISTS ( SELECT '1' FROM PR_CONR_TGT_INFO S1 WHERE CB.CONR_NO = S1.CONR_NO AND S1.CONR_TGT_CD LIKE #{conrTgtCd} || '%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT '1' FROM PR_TMPL_CONR_MAPP_INFO S2 , PR_TMPL_BASE S3 WHERE CB.CONR_NO = S2.CONR_NO AND S2.TMPL_NO = S3.TMPL_NO AND S3.TMPL_NO LIKE #{tmplNo} || '%' AND S3.TMPL_NM LIKE #{tmplNm} || '%' AND S3.TMPL_TYP_CD LIKE #{tmplTypCd} || '%' )
ORDER BY CB.CONR_NO

SELECT /* prConrBase.TemplateList */ PTB.TMPL_NO , PTB.TMPL_NM , PTB.TMPL_PATH_NM || PTB.TMPL_FILE_NM AS TMPL_FILE_PATH , (CASE WHEN PTB.USE_YN='Y' THEN '사용' ELSE '사용안함' END) AS USE_YN , FN_GET_CODENAME( 'DP004', PTB.TMPL_TYP_CD ) AS TMPL_TYP_CD FROM PR_TMPL_BASE PTB , PR_TMPL_CONR_MAPP_INFO CMI WHERE PTB.TMPL_NO = CMI.TMPL_NO AND CMI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} ORDER BY PTB.TMPL_NO
mapper.select: SELECT /* prConrBase.getDisplayCornerDetail */ CB.CONR_NO , CB.CONR_NM , CB.USE_YN , UB.USER_ID , UB.USER_NM , CB.CONR_DESC , CB.CONR_IMG_FILE_NM , CB.CONR_IMG_PATH_NM , CB.SET_USE_YN , CB.SET_CNT FROM PR_CONR_BASE CB , ST_USER_BASE UB WHERE CB.AEMP_ID = UB.USER_ID AND CB.CONR_NO = #{conrNo}
SELECT /* prConrBase.checkPrDispConrInfo */ COUNT(*) FROM PR_DISP_CONR_INFO WHERE CONR_NO = #{conrNo}
SELECT /* prConrBase.checkPrTmplConrMappInfo */ COUNT(*) FROM PR_TMPL_CONR_MAPP_INFO WHERE CONR_NO = #{conrNo}

SELECT /* prConrBase.getConnerDetail */ PCB.CONR_NO , PCB.CONR_NM , UB.USER_NM , PCB.CONR_DESC , PCB.CONR_IMG_PATH_NM , PCB.SET_USE_YN FROM PR_CONR_BASE PCB , ST_USER_BASE UB WHERE PCB.AEMP_ID = UB.USER_ID AND PCB.CONR_NO = #{conrNo}

WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS /* prConrBase.getDispHierarchyNm */ ( SELECT DCB.DISP_CTG_NO , DCB.DISP_CTG_NM , DCB.UPR_DISP_CTG_NO , DCB.DPML_NO , 1 AS LEVEL , PDB.DPML_NM || ' >' AS HIERARCHY_NM FROM PR_DISP_CTG_BASE DCB, PR_DPML_BASE PDB WHERE DCB.UPR_DISP_CTG_NO = ( SELECT DISP_CTG_NO FROM PR_DISP_CTG_BASE WHERE SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND UPR_DISP_CTG_NO = '1' ) AND DCB.SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND DCB.DPML_NO = PDB.DPML_NO UNION ALL SELECT PDCB.DISP_CTG_NO , PDCB.DISP_CTG_NM , PDCB.UPR_DISP_CTG_NO , PDCB.DPML_NO , LEVEL + 1 , REGEXP_REPLACE( CONCAT_WS('>', TMP1.HIERARCHY_NM, PDCB.DISP_CTG_NM) , ' >', '') AS HIERARCHY_TEXT FROM PR_DISP_CTG_BASE PDCB , CTE AS TMP1 WHERE TMP1.DISP_CTG_NO = PDCB.UPR_DISP_CTG_NO ) SELECT * FROM CTE WHERE CTE.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT /* prConrBase.setConnerList */ DISP_CTG_NO , CONR_NO , CONR_TGT_NO , DPTH_NO , SET_NM , DISP_SEQ , DISP_YN , SET_DESC , GRP_TGT_NO , UPR_CONR_TGT_NO , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_CONR_SET_INFO PCSI WHERE DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND DPTH_NO = '1' ORDER BY DISP_SEQ
mapper.select: SELECT /* prConrBase.getFirstSetConnerList */ CONR_NO , CONR_TGT_NO , CONR_TGT_NM AS SET_NM , DISP_SEQ , DPTH_NO , 'Y' AS DISP_YN , CONR_TGT_NO AS GRP_TGT_NO , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_CONR_TGT_INFO WHERE CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND DPTH_NO = '1' ORDER BY CONR_TGT_NO

SELECT /* prConrBase.CornerListPopup */ CB.CONR_NO , CB.CONR_NM , ( SELECT ARRAY_TO_STRING(ARRAY_AGG(FN_GET_CODENAME('DP005',S3.CONR_TGT_CD)),'+') FROM PR_CONR_TGT_INFO S3 WHERE CB.CONR_NO = S3.CONR_NO ) AS DISP_TGT , (CASE WHEN CB.USE_YN='Y' THEN '사용' ELSE '사용안함' END) AS USE_YN , UB.USER_NM FROM PR_CONR_BASE CB , ST_USER_BASE UB WHERE CB.AEMP_ID = UB.USER_ID AND COALESCE(AEMP_ID,'X') LIKE #{aempId} || '%' AND CB.USE_YN LIKE #{useYn} || '%' AND CB.CONR_NO LIKE #{conrNo} || '%' AND CB.CONR_NM LIKE #{conrNm} || '%'
AND EXISTS ( SELECT '1' FROM PR_CONR_TGT_INFO S1 WHERE CB.CONR_NO = S1.CONR_NO )
ORDER BY CB.CONR_NO
